pullRequest.title: feat(frontend): Implement useSearch hook
pullRequest.description:
This change introduces the `useSearch` hook, which uses TanStack Query to provide a reactive and efficient way to fetch search results from the backend. The implementation includes the hook itself, comprehensive unit tests, and the necessary testing infrastructure setup for the frontend application.

pullRequest.title: feat(frontend): add useAsk hook
pullRequest.description:
This change introduces the `useAsk` hook, which provides a clean and reusable way to interact with the `/api/v1/answer` endpoint using TanStack Query. It also sets up the frontend testing environment with Vitest and React Testing Library, and includes a test suite for the new hook.

pullRequest.title: feat(frontend): add useIngestion hook
pullRequest.description:
This change introduces the `useIngestion` hook, which provides a clean and reusable interface for interacting with the ingestion API. It leverages TanStack Query to manage state, caching, and polling, improving the overall architecture of the frontend. Additionally, this change establishes a complete testing infrastructure for the frontend, including the installation and configuration of Vitest, JSDOM, and React Testing Library, along with a new test file for the `useIngestion` hook.

---
